## Read-in, first glimpse and remove outliers/errors

```{r libraries}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
library(ggcorrplot)
library(vegan)
```

### Geospatial variables

```{r read_in}
otemma <- read_excel("./otemma2018.xlsx")

geo_vars = c(4,5,6,8,10,11,14)

otemma_geo <- otemma %>% 
  slice(geo_vars) %>% # multiple data
  t() %>% # transpose
  as_tibble() # to df


otemma_geo <- otemma_geo %>% 
  slice(-1:-2) %>% # remove 2 fist rows as they have the names
  set_names(otemma_geo[1,]) %>%  # rename the columns
  as_tibble(.name_repair = "unique") %>%
  slice(1:100)

otemma_geo <- otemma_geo %>% 
  mutate(
    `altitude` = as.numeric(`altitude`),
    `x` = as.numeric(`x`),
    `y` = as.numeric(`y`),
    `orient_deg`  = as.numeric(`orient_deg`),
    `slope` = as.numeric(`slope`),
    `dist_main_river` = as.numeric(`dist_main_river`),
    `dist_close_river` = as.numeric(`dist_close_river`)
    ) %>% 
  suppressWarnings()
```

```{r glimpse}
otemma_geo %>% glimpse()
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

rows_del <- c()
rows_del <- append(rows_del, -67) # delete line 67 because area too small

otemma_geo %>% 
  select_if(is.numeric) %>% 
  gather() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = value)) +
  geom_boxplot(position = position_dodge(0.8)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  # xlab("Variable") +
  # ylab("Value") +
  ggtitle("Geospatial variables (numeric)") +
  facet_wrap(~key, scales = "free_y", ncol = 4)
```

### Species variables

```{r read_in_species}

vascular_vars <- c(47:96)
bryo_vars <- c(102:112)
lichen_vars <- c(116:121)
species_vars <- c(vascular_vars) # only vascular for now, code for others not clear

otemma_species <- otemma %>% 
  slice(species_vars) %>% # multiple data
  t() %>% # transpose
  as_tibble() # to df

otemma_species <- otemma_species %>% 
  slice(-1:-2) %>% # remove 2 fist rows as they have the names
  set_names(otemma_species[1,]) %>% # rename the columns
  slice(1:100)

# Species can be treated before joining for easiness
otemma_species <- otemma_species %>%
  # We'll be using "Dominance NumÃ©rique 1", but there can be many possibilities
  mutate_all(~ case_when(
                            is.na(.) ~ "0",
                            . == "r" ~ "0.1",
                            . == "+" ~ "0.5",
                            . == "1" ~ "1",
                            . == "2a" ~ "2",
                            . == "2b" ~ "2.5"
                          )
                        ) %>% 
  mutate_all(as.numeric) %>% 
  slice(1:nrow(.))
```

```{r glimpse}
otemma_species %>% glimpse()
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
otemma_species %>%
  select_if(is.numeric) %>% 
  gather() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = value)) +
  geom_boxplot(position = position_dodge(0.8)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  # xlab("Variable") +
  # ylab("Value") +
  ggtitle("Species variables") +
  facet_wrap(~key, scales = "free_y", ncol = 10)
```
